Forum Drive , Grand Prairie, TX, 75052', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 71', 'OR Text', '71', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'NEW APTS COMING 2021', 'This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 936 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Just in case you needed proof that life is good, here comes Copeland.', "This new apartment community in Grand Prairie will live up to the city's reputation of happy residents with vibrant social spaces and a resort-worthy pool & spa.", '(Did we mention there will be complimentary kombucha on tap in the game room?)', 'When staying home is in order, our fabulously appointed apartments come with all the bells and whistles.', 'Come on over to Copeland', 'and get happy.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $25', 'Comments: At Copeland, we welcome your furry friends!', 'We charge a $350 non- refundable pet fee per pet and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions apply.', 'All pets will require registration, photos, and records in <URL>, and an additional fee will apply.', 'Qs5H85etKo']
